entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 1:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

Visibility: 2.8 km

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
